newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: S.Korean KEPCO tenders to buy 1.2 mln bbl Jun LSWR.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean KEPCO tenders to buy 1.2 mln bbl Jun LSWR.

text.p: The Korean Electric Power Corp (KEPCO) has issued a tender to buy two 600,000-barrel cargoes of low sulphur waxy residue (LSWR) for June delivery, a company official said on Wednesday.
One cargo is for delivery between June 3-7 and the other is for June 26-30, both to the ports of Ulsan or Pusan.
The tender closes April 15 and is valid for one day.
KEPCO last purchased 500,000 barrels of May LSWR from Dutch trader Vitol at $18.55 per barrel for delivery between May 11-15 to the ports of Ulsan or Pusan on a cost-and-freight basis.
